Crammage is an online implementation of the
SuperMemo algorithm. Crammage presents flash cards and schedules the next review based on the user's performance. Such Spaced learning aims to minimize review of cards the student knows well, focusing the student's attention on cards he knows less well.
Crammage is inspired by
SuperMemo and
Mnemosyne . It differs from these other implementations in two significant ways. It is online only, obviating the need to download and install an application. Staff reviews submitted card decks and endorses those decks considered to be of high quality.
Crammage claims to be non-profit and is apparently free.
